definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Get simply very dinkum , calm very thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 简单得很纯粹，平静得很彻底。

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按时分没有平静，也能够或许选择围攻或水力压抑。

sentences.english: That has since calmed down and the markets have gotten even quieter lately.
sentences.chinese: 此后市场逐渐平静下来，最近已变得更为平静了。

sentences.english: That has since calmed down and the markets have gotten even quieter lately.
sentences.chinese: 此后市场逐渐平静下来，最近已变得更为平静了。

sentences.english: When I was listening to the final theme song, my heart was kind of stirred and could not calm down.
sentences.chinese: 听着最后的主题曲，我的心情久久不能平静。

sentences.english: Try breathing easily and gently tell yourself to relax.
sentences.chinese: 让呼吸平静下来，轻轻告戒自己放松心情。

sentences.english: Only with Heathly, happy, calm is OK.
sentences.chinese: 只要健康，快乐，平静，就好。

sentences.english: I could not hold my calmness any more and shouted at him irritatingly.
sentences.chinese: 我再也无法平静，眼睛喷了火，逼视着他。

sentences.english: To play Taijiquan, you have to keep a quiet mind.
sentences.chinese: 打太极拳时，你必须保持内心平静。

sentences.english: Then, set aside 5 or 10 minutes to focus on quieting your thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 然后，定5至10分钟来让你的思绪平静下来。

sentences.english: In the harbor sailboats are easily cruising on the blue and peaceful water.
sentences.chinese: 海港中，帆船在湛蓝而平静的海面上飘来飘去。

sentences.english: STEVE EMBER: The gardens offer peace in the middle of a busy city.
sentences.chinese: 这个橡树园给繁忙的闹市带来一份平静。

sentences.english: It's been so quiet since you've gone, And everyday feels more like a year.
sentences.chinese: 你离开后生活如此平静，而我竟觉度日如年。

sentences.english: Placidly they continued their eating and feeding routine.
sentences.chinese: 然后它们平静地进食和喂食。

sentences.english: It was calm and not a leaf moved .
sentences.chinese: 平静得连一片叶子也没有动。

sentences.english: He answered with a calm voice.

definition: Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
